name: Vasilisa the Beautiful
description:
Vasilisa, a young, obedient girl, suffers from the abuse of her family. On a particularly cruel day, she is asked to retrieve a flame from an old witch living in the woods. This is based on the Russian fairy tale of the same name. 

This was intended to be entered for a particular game jam; however, I missed the deadline. Even still, please enjoy playing! There is only one final ending, though there are a few bumps along the way that could get you a "game over"!
